Before it does, read this: http://tgr.ph/pqdVWP #ukriots #cameron #hypocricy [caption id="attachment_100100706" align="alignnone" width="460" caption="Tottenham ablaze: the riots began early on Sunday (Photo: AP)"][/caption] David Cameron, Ed Miliband and the entire British political class came together yesterday to denounce the rioters.
